message.content:
cs.CR, cs.CY, cs.DB, cs.IR, cs.SI 

This paper discusses the challenges faced by both users and organizations in dealing with Personal Identifiable Information (PII) and proposes a framework that balances user's privacy and data control with an organization's objective of delivering quality, targeted and efficient services to their customers using the "collected user data". This topic is closely related to cybersecurity (cs.CR), cyber law and policy (cs.CY), database systems (cs.DB), information retrieval (cs.IR), and social and information networks (cs.SI).
